children: The following layers are helper functions for easily building neural differential equation architectures in the currently most efficient way. As demonstrated in the tutorials, they do not have to be used since automatic differentiation will just work over
, but these cover common use cases and choose what's known to be the optimal mode of AD for the respective equation type.

NeuralODE
NeuralDSDE
NeuralSDE
NeuralCDDE
NeuralDAE
NeuralODEMM
AugmentedNDELayer
